title: HSBC Holdings plc
description: HSBC Holdings plc is represented by its distinctive colors: 'DB0011', a bold red symbolizing strength and passion; 'FFFFFF', a clean white signifying clarity and integrity; and '000000', a sleek black denoting sophistication and authority. These colors are notably recognized from HSBC's branding elements visible across its global presence, including its official website, marketing materials, and physical branches.
